name: Cookie Runner - Remastered
description:
Cookie runner remastered is an updated version of the jam game cookie runner, made for Games Factory Jam 7. It's a reaction based arcade game where your a cookie zooming through other cookies, dodging those cookies. There is large amount of  purchasable cookies (in game gold) that will allow you to fly in style! Beat your friends high score in this extremely reaction intensive game.  

Controls: Space if on pc, touch if on mobile.
